basics.name: Mahmoud Abdel Mohsen
basics.title: M.Eng., B.Sc., PMP®, LEED AP BD+C®
basics.label: AI Engineer / Full Stack Developer
basics.summary: Experienced  Full Stack Developer and AI Engineer  with a strong background in computational design and architectural engineering. Proven track record in developing innovative solutions and processes automation. Skilled in various programming languages and frameworks, with a passion for leveraging technology to improve efficiency and effectiveness, with a focus on healthcare, education, housing, and social development domains.

work.name: PREA Group
work.summary: Worked on design automation projects, focusing on data center architectural design and environmental strategies.
responsibilities: Planing and development of design and construction automation project.
Participating in data center architectural design.
Development and implementation of environmental design strategies.
achievements: Successfully implemented design automation tools that improved project efficiency.
Contributed to the development of innovative environmental strategies for data center design.

work.name: Schlumberger
work.summary: Acted as an owner representative for various architectural projects, ensuring compliance with design specifications and quality standards.
responsibilities: Managed internal stakeholders debriefing for new projects.
Designed architectural and technical projects in EMEA and APAC region.
Acting as owner representative for oversees projects.
achievements: Successfully completed multiple high-profile projects within budget and timeline constraints.
Received positive feedback from clients for innovative design solutions.

work.name: Al Khayyat Investments (AKI)
work.summary: Served as a liaison engineer, coordinating between various stakeholders to ensure project alignment and compliance with engineering standards.
responsibilities: Coordination between construction teams, project stakeholders and regulatory authorities.
Provide technical expertise, guidance and interpretation of construction documents to ensure adherence to engineering principles and project requirements.
Conduct site inspections, quality control checks and ensure compliance with building codes, safety regulations and industry standards.
achievements: Successfully managed multiple projects, ensuring timely completion and adherence to budget constraints.
Improved communication and collaboration between project teams, resulting in enhanced project efficiency.

work.name: FA Engineering Consultants
work.summary: Worked as an architect, focusing on the design and development of various architectural projects, ensuring they met client specifications and regulatory requirements.
responsibilities: Collaboration with clients to understand their project requirements, design preferences and site constraints.
Developing conceptual designs, sketches and 3D models to visually communicate design ideas and solutions.
Preparing detailed architectural drawings, including floor plans, elevations, sections and construction details using CAD software.
achievements: Successfully completed multiple high-profile projects within budget and timeline constraints.
Received positive feedback from clients for innovative design solutions.

work.name: Archen Engineering Consultants
work.summary: Collaborated with engineering consultants, specified materials and systems, and prepared visual presentations to communicate architectural designs.
responsibilities: Coordinating with engineering consultants to integrate their input into the architectural design.
Selecting and specifying appropriate building materials, finishes and systems, based on project requirements and design intent.
Preparing design presentations, renderings, and other visual aids to effectively communicate the proposed design to clients and stakeholders.
achievements: Successfully completed multiple high-profile projects within budget and timeline constraints.
Received positive feedback from clients for innovative design solutions.
